thread.title: The Wholesalers Canada, US Expands Its Stock Of Mufflers
thread.title_full: The Wholesalers Canada, US Expands Its Stock Of Mufflers

title: The Wholesalers Canada, US Expands Its Stock Of Mufflers
text: The Wholesalers Canada, US Expands Its Stock Of Mufflers Mufflers Manufacturer, Wholesalers Canada Canada, 23 September 2015 -- Muffler Express specializes in mufflers and allied accessories but also provides other exhaust system spares with same perfection. Whether your car’s exhaust repairing needs catalytic converter, muffler, manifold gasket, laser cut flanges or flex repairing pipes, Muffler Express has all in stock to supply within 24 hours.The good news is that if you drive an old variant car with leaky or partially failed muffler just because of non-availability of compatible muffler, Muffler Express offers range of options to upgrade the complete exhaust system. Muffler Express is the well designed online Wholesalers Canada, US that provides exhaust system spares and kits of old variants of all the models including GM, Acura, Honda, Nissan, Plymouth, Hyundai, Chevrolet, Jaguar, Chrysler, Ford etc. As the name suggests, Muffler Express specializes in mufflers and allied accessories but also provides other exhaust system spares with same perfection. Whether your car’s exhaust repairing needs catalytic converter, muffler, manifold gasket, laser cut flanges or flex repairing pipes, Muffler Express has all in stock to supply within 24 hours. The searches for the particular products can be initiated either by the product like muffler, manifold gasket, laser cut flanges etc or by the vehicle’s brand. Here, you will find the exhaust system parts that you hardly find elsewhere. The Spokesperson of Muffler Express says, “It is conceptualized to become the hub of reputed Mufflers Manufacturer and Wholesalers in US. The strong ties ups and strategic supply chain help us to offer the products at least price. Our online guidance helps the clients to define and find the best compatible exhaust accessories; if we don’t have the desired product in stock, we make the arrangement for the customization also.” Direct Fit Acura 1.6 EL for 1996-2000 models, Chevrolet Impala left and right side AP for 2006-2011 models, Back LWB 3.3L Chrysler for 2001-2007 models and Direct Fit Honda CRV for 2002-2006 models are the new additions to stock. Honda Accord 4 cylinders 4dr sedan and 2dr Coupe muffler assembly fits to all the 4wheel drive models and all 2 wheel drive coupe models of 1998-2002. Nissan Maxima muffler kit fits to all the models from April 1999 to 2003. Back 3.8L Dodge Grand, Back Dodge Caravan Exhaust System and Dodge Grand Caravan / Plymouth Grand Voyager muffler system are there to take care of old Dodge models 1996 to 2007. So, even if you own a car more than a decade old, it is possible to upgrade the exhaust standards as per latest CARB or NY norms. Company Details
